attributes.additional_details:
The reasons why i would like parliament or the government to stop uniform in schools, is because if young people could wear their own clothing items, then the following could happen;
• Students will be more comfortable in school and therefore work and concentrate better.
• Students will be able to wear clothing to suit the weather conditions.
In my recent studies, i have came to the conclusion that children can concentrate better at school with their own clothing. I think this is a good option.
attributes.background: I would sincerely appreciate for uniform to be not used in schools, this is for a number of reasons.
